com.soa.security.script
Class BST

java.lang.Object
  com.soa.security.script.BST

public class BST
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a WS-Security Binary Security Token credential in a scripted environment.

You can retrieve a BST from an authenticated subject for a single X.509 certificate as follows: 

    bst = subject.getBST("wsse:X509v3");

You can create a new BST to hold a single X.509 certificate and add it to a subject as follows: 

    bst = BST.create("wsse:X509v3");
    bst.setValue(certBytes);
    subject.addPublicCredential(bst);
